programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms

programme.title: The Shuttle Program, The Challenger Disaster & Return to Space
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E12, The Shuttle Program - The first re-useable spacecraft. programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System

programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E05, Returning to the Carsenome with the Menoptra's isop-tope device, the Doctor and Vicki are herded into a chamber where they are enveloped in a web-like substance, what next for the Doctor.

programme.title: The Centre
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Web Planet, S01E06, The TARDIS dematerialises from the surface of Vortis. Prapillus vows that the Earth people will never be forgotten and warns that the Animus must never again be allowed to take root on the planet.

programme.title: The Space Museum
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Space Museum, S01E01, The Doctor and his companions arrive on a planet which houses an all but forgotten museum. While touring it, they are horrified to discover that they themselves are exhibits in one of the cases. Can they avoid becoming just an exhibit in the space museum?

programme.title: The Dimensions of Time
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Space Museum, S01E02, As the Doctor and his companions move through the museum's vast labyrinth of corridors, the enslaved Xeron race sense an opportunity to topple their Morok invaders.

programme.title: The Search
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Space Museum, S01E03, With the Doctor held captive by the Commander Lobos and destined to become an exhibit in the space museum, his companions are left to do whatever they can to break the chain of events.

programme.title: The Final Phase
programme.desc: Classic Doctor Who: The Space Museum, S01E04, Ian confronts Lobos and orders him to revive the Doctor as the Xerons' revolution begins to gather pace. But when the four time-travellers are re-captured, will the Doctor's prediction of a future as museum exhibits finally be realised?

programme.title: The Executioners
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E01, Ian and Vicki are trapped by tentacled creatures on the planet Aridius. The Doctor and Barbara witness Daleks leaving Skaro on a mission to eliminate the Doctor and his companions.

programme.title: The Death of Time
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E02, The Doctor and his friends have been given shelter from the Daleks by the Aridians. But the Daleks threaten to kill the Aridians unless they hand over the time travellers.

programme.title: Flight Through Eternity
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E03, The Daleks pursue the TARDIS through time and space. In an attempt to lose the Daleks, the Doctor makes a stop on the top of the Empire State Building and then on a sailing ship.

programme.title: Journey into Terror
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E04, With the Daleks in pursuit, the TARDIS lands in what appears to be a haunted house. When the Daleks arrive, the travellers depart, not realising that they have left Vicki behind!

programme.title: The Death of Doctor Who
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Chase, S01E05, The Daleks follow the TARDIS to the jungle world of Mechanus which is infested with lethal plants. There the Daleks release a robot double of the Doctor that is programmed to kill.

programme.title: She Never Came Home
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E03, The case of a gruesome stabbing death of a bullied teenager remains unsolved for 27 years.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E03, When a church deacon is found shot to death it looks like police may have stumbled upon a multi-party murder plot. And, a wife remains a key suspect in her husband's murder case for six years, until she attempts to prove her own innocence.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Written In Blood
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E19, In July of 1970, the brutal murder of single mom Loretta Jones leaves four-year-old Heidi motherless. Nearly 40 years later, she vows to solve her mother's cold case.

programme.title: Circle of Friends
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E07, When 18-year-old Shannon Siders' body is found in the woods, everyone in the small town of Newaygo, Michigan, becomes a suspect--but no one is convicted of the crime.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Killings on Christmas Eve
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S01E02, A family is torn apart by their grandparents' murders. Two decades later, a cold case detective takes on the case that has haunted him since he was a child--racing to solve it before the family takes matters into their own hands.
MST3K: Earth vs. The Spider, 19910914000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots get tips on public speaking from the short Speech: Using Your Voice and watch a spider devour a town in Earth vs the Spider (1958)

MST3K: Escape 2000, 19960302000000 +0000, A grunge punk fights an evil corporation enforcing an evacuation of the Bronx in Escape from the Bronx (1983). Mike and the Bots have "Men's Night" on the SOL and Dr. Forester tries to come up with a way to boost the show's ratings.
MST3K: First Spaceship On Venus, 19901229000000 +0000, A multinational team of astronauts heads to Venus, but finds a world destroyed by nuclear war.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Barugon, 19910622000000 +0000, The Mads send the crew another Gamera movie. This time, a group of travelers scour the jungle in search of a giant opal. What they find is actually the egg of a lizard-dog creature called Barugon.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Gaos, 19910727000000 +0000, Gamera is back and this time he is up against Gaos, a bat-monster with the ability to shoot laser beams. Joel and the Bots make an arts and crafts project.
MST3K: Gamera Vs. Guiron, 19910907000000 +0000, It's Gamera Movie #4, including the Gamera Theme Song and a reenactment of an old favorite magic trick.

MST3K: Gamera Vs. Zigra, 19911019000000 +0000, The seventh offering from Gamera: the infamous turtle faces off against an alien called Zigra determined on world domination. Joel and the Bots build a scale model of Gamera and make shoebox dioramas.

The Blackwater Lightship, 20040204000000 +0000, Based on the novel by Colm Toibin, The Blackwater Lightship tells the compelling story of reconciliation between three generations of women that has been marked by decades of misunderstandings.
Nearlyweds, 20130112000000 +0000, Complications arise when three women (Danielle Panabaker, Jessica Parker Kennedy) learn that their marriages are not official.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

Cedar Cove, 20130720000000 +0000, When Olivia Lockhart (Andie MacDowell) is given the opportunity for a federal judgeship, she must face the challenging decision, and while tempting, she risks losing her new romance and leaving the town and people she loves most.

Away & Back, 20150125000000 +0000, Jack Peterson, a widowed father of three young children, encounters Ginny Newsom, a wildlife biologist, whose mission is tracking trumpeter swans, a family of which settles on a pond on the Peterson farm.

Missing Pieces, 20000206000000 +0000, A Colorado rancher uncovers a bed of lies and unanswered questions as he investigates his son's apparent suicide. Stars James Coburn. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. A blizzard threatens disaster in Middleton.

programme.title: Together We Stand...
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. The winter storm continues to pose a threat to all of Middleton.

programme.title: True Colors
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's enchanting "Good Witch" Cassie receives devastating news.

programme.title: We're Not Losing a Son
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Abby settles in and starts her job at her firm's Baltimore office.

programme.title: The Lost Tribe
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E11, Jackson and McKay have reactivated the Attero device, an ancient machine designed to annihilate the Wraith. In doing so, they discover the reason the device was ultimately abandonedâ€¦ Meanwhile, Todd continues to hold the Daedalus crew captive.

programme.title: Outsiders
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E12, Col. Sheppard and his team locate Dr. Carson Beckett on an alien planet where he is treating a small group of survivors of the Hoffan plague. But that same evening, a party of Wraith warriors arrives, threatening total annihilation.

programme.title: Inquisition
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E13, A newly formed galactic coalition extends an invitation to Lt. Col. John Sheppard and his team to represent Atlantis at their next meeting. But on arrival, the team is immediately detained and must stand trial for crimes against humanity.

programme.title: The Prodigal
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E14, Atlantis is suddenly plunged into darkness, with only the top tier of the central tower unaffected. As Sheppard and McKay attempt to get to the top level, they discover that a force field has been established to prevent them from gaining access.

programme.title: Remnants
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E15, While Richard Woolsey (Robert Picardo) struggles to keep his position as the leader of Atlantis, and McKay (David Hewlett) and Zelenka (David Nykl) investigate a mysterious find, Sheppard is captured by an old enemy with plans to invade the city.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E17, The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crewâ€¦ who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those whoâ€™ve returned.

programme.title: Resurgence
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E10, In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Twin Destinies
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E12, Excitement spreads through the ship as Eli believes heâ€™s found a way to dial Earth. But Dr. Rush has serious reservations about abandoning Destiny, and when the crew is interrupted by a distress call, it may just change the plans of the Destiny.

programme.title: Singularity
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E15, Capt. Carter returns with the sole survivor of a planetary plague - a little girl, Cassandra. As they become attached, Carter discovers the girl's terrible secret - a time bomb implanted by the Goa'uld. Can she save the girl - and the world?

programme.title: Cor-Ai
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E16, Colonel Jack O'Neill and the team travel to Chartago, where Teal'c is recognized as once having been head Jaffa to the sinister Goa'uld Apothis. He's arrested for murder and put on trial for his life. Can his comrades save him?

programme.title: Enigma
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E17, The SG-1 team rescues a group of highly developed survivors from the cataclysmic planet of Tollan. To stop the legendary knowledge of the Tollan people from falling into the wrong hands, O'Neill and his team stake all on the cross-universal rescue.

programme.title: Solitudes
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S01E18, Following a Stargate technical defect, O'Neill and Carter find themselves stranded on an icy wasteland. O'Neill is severely wounded, both are freezing to death, and nobody can find the section of the universe in which they are stranded!

programme.title: Tin Man

programme.title: Strangers Among Us
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E14, Mitch and Stephanie cope with an odd assembly of UFO enthusiasts camping on the beach in anticipation of an extraterrestrial visitation. Smugglers threaten Summer to recover diamonds they hid inside a surfboard Slade gave her.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E15, The Baywatch lifeguards set sail on a romantic cruise, only to encounter a dangerous fugitive, who forces Mitch and Stephanie overboard into the stormy Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Vacation, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E16, While on a vacation cruise, the Baywatch lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers, leaving Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the stormy Pacific, and Summer, Matt, CJ, and Guido faced with outwitting ruthless killers who have overtaken the ship.

programme.title: The Tower
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E17, An escaped psychopath takes Summer and Stephanie hostage in a lifeguard tower, necessitating a thrilling subterranean rescue attempt by Mitch and Matt.

programme.title: Stakeout at Surfrider Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E18, Mitch finds himself falling for an Italian actress who is being stalked by ruthless robbers. Meanwhile, CJ and Stephanie help Guido pretend to be a lifeguard in order to impress his visiting mother.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E19, When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Shattered, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E20, Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year-old paraplegic, is pursued by a hitman trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Kicks
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E21, Mitch coaches Matt in an amateur kickboxing tournament, but the competition turns deadly when an enemy from Mitch's past gets him into the ring. Meanwhile, CJ, seduced by a fashion photographer, considers leaving Baywatch for a modeling career.

programme.title: Fatal Exchange
programme.desc: Baywatch, S03E22, Mitch contends with an unorthodox, risk-taking Australian lifeguard, and rekindles his love affair with a beautiful journalist, Kaye Morgan.

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E01, Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fiancÃ© Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Race Against Time, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E02, A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Lover's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E03, Romance is in the air at Baywatch as Mitch and Jackie's friendship grows more intense, Summer and Matt begin a relationship, and Hobie falls in love with Lauren, a junior lifeguard with a devastating secret.

programme.title: Blindside
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E04, John D. Cort, Mitch's friend and a former lifeguard, returns to Baywatch where his life undergoes a devastating change. Meanwhile, Hobie meets a very "unique" new friend.

programme.title: Skyrider
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E05, Summer has love problems when Slade returns from a world surfing tour to discover Matt and Summer are dating. CJ is persistently pursued by a bungee jumping balloonist. Meanwhile, Garner patrols the beach on horseback.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E06, A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Tentacles, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E07, Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fiancÃ©, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Submersion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S04E08, Mitch saves two boys from drowning. But when one ends up in a coma, Mitch suffers from PTSD and is left reevaluating his life as a lifeguard.
